thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 11 of 496
thread.title: Jodi

author: Jodi
title: Jodi
text: Dental Lace refillable dental floss is on a mission to eliminate ugly plastic waste from the dental floss market. We needed a 2X2" bag for our refills. Find us on Facebook or search Dental Lace, Inc. to see our product. Clearbags enabled us to eliminate the poly bags we had been using. Their service was fantastic. The quality of the bags are great. I also appreciated the fact that they provide a clear description of their products. Dental Lace, Inc. benefited from our relationship with Clearbags. Thank you.
